Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RI-CleanX-R3 Share : Description Specification Documents Description Robot Industries CleanX R3 5-in-1 AI Cleaning Robot Robot Industries, a global leader in advanced robotics with cutting-edge manufacturing and R&D facilities spanning Europe, North America, and Asia, is proud to introduce the CleanX R3 5-IN-1 AI Cleaning Robot Line. This groundbreaking innovation sets a new standard in cleaning efficiency, delivering exceptional performance and effortless integration into modern business operations, all packaged in an intuitive, user-friendly design. THE FUTURE OF CLEANING, TODAY The CleanX R3 is more than just a cleaning robot—it's an all-in-one solution that can be adapted to the usage needs of offices, hotels, factories, hospitals, or government centers. With advanced AI at its core, it seamlessly adapts to different environments, delivering flawless results even in the busiest and most demanding settings. Here’s what makes the CleanX R3 a game-changer: ● Detects and switches cleaning modes automatically for carpets and hard floors.● Navigates elevators, gates, and multi-floor operations independently, making it ideal for large facilities. ● Automatically recharges, drains, and refills through its integrated base station.● It is equipped with advanced sensors to identify and avoid obstacles, ensuring smooth and secure operation. ● Features next-generation lithium iron phosphate batteries for fast charging and extended battery life. DESIGNED FOR RESPONDING TO REAL BUSINESS NEEDSFrom corporate offices to hospitals, schools, and hotels, the CleanX R3 effortlessly handles the demands of modern facilities. Its flexibility and precision make it a valuable asset in spaces where cleanliness and safety are non-negotiable. The CleanX R3 is the ultimate cleaning partner for Factorie/Logistic Centers Offices Commercial Centers Hotels/Public Sector Warehouse Applicable ground Key Features and Technical Specifications: 5-in-1 Cleaning Modes Combining sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, dusting, and Automatic base station built with environmentally friendly materials and designed to use less energy. High Cleaning Efficiency Capable of covering 400-700 sqm/h. The CleanX R3 is able to handle multiple cleaning tasks at the same time, guaranteeing thorough care for different surfaces and environments. Extended Runtime and High-Capacity Tanks The CleanX R3 covers a large area, making it ideal for different types of floors and big spaces: 5h - Scrubbing, 5h - Vacuuming, 18h - Sweeping, 10h - Dust Mopping Clean Water Tank Designed to operate efficiently with little intervention." Waste Water Tank Automatic recharging, refilling the clean water tank, emptying the dirty water tank, emptying the vacuum dustbin, and self-cleaning of the docking system." Wide Cleaning Coverage With a 490 mm cleaning width navigation, CleanX R3 uses real-time mapping and intelligent obstacle avoidance to create an optimal cleaning path, identifying obstacles as small as 1 cm to protect furniture and belongings. Advanced AI Navigation System Equipped with Visual SLAM / Laser SLAM a variety of sensors combined with advanced algorithms, efficient detection, faster response, can identify pedestrians, objects, steps, etc., to achieve multiple security guarantees. Benefits: Comprehensive Cleaning 6 liters, ensuring it collects waste efficiently and minimizes downtime. Minimal Maintenance is an advanced cleaning robot equipped with an autonomous docking station, designed to meet the demands of large commercial spaces such as office buildings, hotels, shopping malls, and warehouses. This robot is capable of performing multiple cleaning tasks, including floor washing, sweeping, and vacuuming, while maintaining exceptional cleaning performance. Eco-Friendly and Energy-Efficient The CleanX R3 by Robot Industries is a powerful and intelligent cleaning tool designed for those seeking high-quality, efficient cleaning solutions. Ideal for offices, warehouses, or large homes, the CleanX R3 sets a new standard for cleanliness with its smart technology and premium functionality, making daily maintenance easy and effective. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RI-WD_TR-600-350A Share : Description Specification Documents Description RI WD Collaborative trolley welding station This system offers spatial cost double liberation, with a customizable size. Its configuration includes a minimalist mobile cart and secondary separation. It is suitable for small and medium-sized enterprises or production lines that require flexible adjustments, as it can quickly switch tasks and reduce equipment investment and space occupancy.Among its advantages are a maximum working radius of 11 meters (9m wire feeder + 2m mechanical arm), covering large workpiece welding. The minimalist trolley design, weighing 240 kg, and its wheels allow for quick switching of work positions. The RI Welding Cobot Cell enables flexible, high-efficiency welding. It can be easily repositioned within the work area, ready for the next task. It supports various welding techniques, including MIG, MAG.RI WELDING COBOT CELL: Master welding system controller, 6-Axis cobot, Portable permanent magnet base, Specialized welding torch, Welding power supply, Wire feeder (with 5 meters cable), Specialized controller boardAPPLICATIONSBranch welding line of steel structure light steel production line, Laminated welding for bridge steel structure, All kinds of application scene, multi welding procedure RI WD Collaborative trolley welding station can deal with complex working conditions, simple, practical, durable and light features, convenient and quick to move to the welding station, at the same time, remove unnecessary accessories, panels, etc., to achieve the most optimized cost. The maximum working radius of RI-WD_TR is 11 meters The wire feeder is separated from the robot arm (the wire feeder is 9m + the robot arm is 2m, the wire feeder can be 9m away from the trolley, and the robot can be 2 meters away from the wire feeder), which can be customized according to customer needs. Switch the station every 5 minutes The pulley design, 240kg minimalist mobile station, can be transported by car, quick switching of work stations, flexible shuttle in the workshop with limited ground, convenient and flexible! RI-WD Collaborative Robot: Optimized for Efficiency, Precision, and AdaptabilityFeaturing an intuitive interface and simplified programming, the RI-WD boosts welding efficiency without requiring advanced skills. Its advanced visual positioning technology ensures precise, real-time path simulation for single and complex multi-welding tasks, enhancing ease of use. Designed for challenging scenarios, the RI-WD excels in deep access, intricate curved surfaces, and high-precision angular welding. Integrated design, flexible application The highly integrated design features a compact, elegant structure that optimizes space while enhancing machine stability and reliability. Its user-friendly maintenance reduces costs and ensures long-term, dependable performance for professional welding applications. Customize welding technology with perfect welding seam Operators can manually customize welding parameters, store additional beam settings, and adjust positioning for various welding requirements, including straight, corner, and diagonal welding. The system’s flexibility accommodates a wide range of welding applications across industries. Widely compatibility to satisfied varied requirement A comprehensive one-stop solution, the RI WD Collaborative welding station supports diverse industry needs with optional professional welding equipment for TIG, MIG, and laser welding. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: N/A Share : Description Specification Description RI WD 3D FreeTeach Industrial Welding Station The Future of Robotic Welding – No Manual Programming Required In today’s industrial environment, where skilled labor shortages, rising costs, and increasing quality demands challenge manufacturers, intelligent welding automation is no longer optional. The RI WD 3D FreeTeach Industrial Welding Station redefines robotic welding by completely eliminating traditional manual programming and transforming welding into a fast, flexible, and efficient process. What is the RI WD 3D FreeTeach Industrial Welding StationThe RI WD 3D FreeTeach is a fully automated industrial welding station equipped with 3D vision technology and intelligent welding path planning software. Unlike traditional “teach & repeat” robotic systems, it: requires no manual welding path programming automatically recognizes part geometry autonomously generates the optimal welding path quickly adapts to different workpieces The result is a dramatic reduction in setup time and consistent welding quality, even for complex parts. FreeTeach Technology – Teach-Free WeldingThe key innovation of the RI WD station is FreeTeach (Teach-Free Welding) technology. The operator no longer needs to manually teach the robot. The system: scans the part using 3D vision automatically detects welding seams calculates optimal welding parameters (speed, current, angle) performs the weld with high precision This approach makes robotic welding accessible even for companies without dedicated robot programmers. Key Features 3D vision system for automatic part recognition Autonomous welding path planning High precision and repeatability (±0.02 mm) Compatibility with multiple industrial robots (RI, FANUC, ABB, Estun, etc.) MIG/MAG welding support (350A – 500A) Advanced welding functions: corner welding, circular welding, multi-pass welding, weaving Automatic torch cleaning system Real Production Benefits Reduced Setup Time Fast configuration for new parts enables quick changeovers between different production batches. Consistent Welding Quality Eliminating manual programming ensures uniform, repeatable welds that meet industrial standards. Maximum Flexibility Ideal for small and medium batch production, where part geometry changes frequently. Lower Operating Costs Reduced dependence on highly skilled welders and fewer defects result in a fast return on investment. Application AreasThe RI WD 3D FreeTeach Industrial Welding Station is ideal for: metal structure fabrication automotive components and subassemblies heavy machinery and industrial equipment customized production and special projectsWhy Choose RI WD 3D FreeTeach✔️ True automation without manual programming ✔️ Fast integration into existing production lines ✔️ Increased productivity and weld quality ✔️ A future-ready solution for modern industry The RI WD 3D FreeTeach Industrial Welding Station is not just a welding system—it is an intelligent automation platform that fundamentally changes how industrial welding is performed. It is the ideal solution for companies aiming to stay competitive, efficient, and ready for the future of manufacturing. Front & Rear Double-Station M-type workstation adopts front and rear double-station arrangement, the robot (welding) and the ope-rator (loading and unloading) work alternately between the two stations. This way can avoid or reduce the robot waiting time and improve productivity. Omni-Directional Welding The workstation is equipped with an external axis vertical turnover indexer, which can coordinate the robot to complete the welding of weld seams in all angular directions. Modular Sizing Single workstation is suitable for the production of products with length less than 1.8m and width less than 1.5m: Double workstation is suitable for the production of products with length less than 3m and wid-th less than 1.5m. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RI-PL-1900-16 Share : Description Specification Documents Description RI Collaborative palletizer 16kg to 40kg payload The RI Collaborative Palletizer, developed by Robot Industries, is a seamless integration of advanced machinery and intelligent software, designed to enhance production efficiency in modern manufacturing. Widely utilized in the stacking and material handling industries, this cutting-edge palletizing robot optimizes operations by automating the stacking process, significantly reducing labor costs and maximizing workspace utilization.The RI Collaborative Palletizer stands out for its precision, flexibility, and high-speed performance, ensuring exceptional stability and operational efficiency. Its system incorporates a patented coordinate robot, designed for a compact and adaptable installation, making it an ideal solution for facilities with limited space. Thanks to Robot Industries' innovative approach, the vision of establishing a fully automated, energy-efficient block molding production line within a small footprint has now become a reality. The RI Collaborative Palletizer is an advanced integration of mechanical systems and software, designed to enhance production efficiency. Widely utilized in the material handling and logistics industry, this palletizing robot streamlines operations by automating the stacking process, significantly reducing labor costs and optimizing workspace utilization. With its high precision, flexibility, and speed, the RI Collaborative Palletizer ensures stable, efficient, and reliable performance, making it an essential solution for modern industrial automation. Simply Maintenance Our machine is stable and reliable with few vulnerable parts.We also provide certain spare parts freely enough for you to use 2+ years, super cost-effective price to you if want more spare parts. Previous Next Simply Flexible Thanks to a non-bolted installation, the Cobot palletizer meets the growing demand for flexibility in production. With its compact and modular design, a quick move can be made within a production facility for seasonal production changes or customized batches. Easy to Use(Code Free) The RI control system focuses on usability and intuitiveness. The operator is in full control of the palletizer – for straightforward, easy installation and configuration.The drag and drop pallet manager also allows the operator to change and configure new pallet patterns in minutes. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RI-TN-8-1400-10 Share : Description Specification Documents Description RI CNC tending collaborative station RI CNC tending station integrates a collaborative robot with intelligent grippers, machine interfaces, and safety features to automate part-handling operations. Unlike traditional industrial robots, collaborative stations are built to work safely alongside human operators — without fencing — making them ideal for dynamic production environments. RI CNC tending collaborative station includes: Collaborative robot with built-in force sensingAn intelligent warehouse system controlled by PLC and HMI interface, the management and access of parts is done using a high-precision 2-axis systemMachine interface modules for seamless communication with CNCs (via I/O or industrial protocols). A workstation frame or mobile base that allows quick deployment Key Advantages24/7 Operation – Enables lights-out manufacturing with continuous, unattended production. Precision & Consistency – Delivers repeatable results, eliminating manual errors. Rapid Deployment – Easy to program and adapt for small batches or frequent changeovers. Safe Collaboration – Built-in sensors allow safe interaction with human workers, no cages needed. Quick ROI – Payback typically within 12–18 months through labor savings and higher uptime. RI CNC tending collaborative station Industry Applications of Machine Tending RobotsMachine tending robots are transforming industrial automation across multiple sectors by improving safety, precision, and throughput. Here's how key industries leverage this technology:Automotive IndustryRobots streamline critical operations such as CNC machining, metal stamping, injection molding, and adhesive dispensing — boosting efficiency and consistency in vehicle and parts production.Metalworking & FabricationIn fabrication shops, robotic tending automates stamping, punching, bending, and cutting tasks, ensuring high accuracy, reduced waste, and faster production cycles.Plastics & Injection MoldingRobots are essential in injection molding lines, where they manage part placement and ejection with speed and precision, reducing cycle times and minimizing defects.Aerospace & DefenseFor high-precision parts, robotic tending ensures consistent loading and unloading, supporting tight tolerances and strict quality control in mission-critical applications.Foundry & CastingDesigned to withstand extreme environments, these robots handle molten materials and high-temperature parts, enhancing operator safety and process reliability. Why Invest in a RI CNC tending collaborative station?Implementing RI CNC tending collaborative station is not just about automation — it’s about future-proofing your production. Whether you’re looking to scale output, optimize shift coverage, or improve precision, collaborative automation delivers flexibility and performance with minimal integration effort.It bridges the gap between manual labor and full industrial automation — empowering manufacturers of any size to compete in today’s high-mix, fast-paced market. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RI-BendingCNC-80-2500-DA53TX4+1-NoArm Share : Description Specification Documents Description RI Electro-hydraulic Servo Bending Machine WE67K Series The RI Electro-Hydraulic Servo Bending Machine WE67K Series offers functionality comparable to the DA58T. Its fully automated navigation system streamlines the adjustment of backstops and rams, simplifying machine setup and significantly reducing commissioning time.Axis configuration, I/O point settings, and auxiliary function parameters can be precisely customized to meet the specific requirements of each bending application. The CNC press brake uses either standard or custom molds to bend cold metal sheets into parts with various geometric cross-sections. It's a metal forming machine specifically designed for processing cold-rolled sheet metal. The RI press brake is equipped with intelligent features, including a touchscreen controller and a crowning system, which simplify the bending process and significantly enhance overall efficiency. INTUITIVE CONTROLLER The user-friendly graphical touch controller gives full play to the bending performance of the machine.SERVO-CONTROLLED HYDRAULIC SYSTEM Hydraulic components are manufactured to a high standard to ensure excellent performance.RIGID STRUCTURE All HUSONE Series are designed and built utilizing a welded one-piece frame machined to guarantee machine precision.LINEAR ENCODERS High-precision linear encoders provide high positioning accuracy and repeat-ability.BACK GAUGE The newly designed back gauge is a robust construction featuring 2-axis or 4-axis configurations for greater flexibility and increased productivity.CNC CROWNING CNC mechanical crowning. High precision, improving the precision of bending angle and linearity. Crowning System During the bending process, stress can cause deformation in both the ram and worktable. The crowning system compensates for this ram deformation, significantly improving the press brake's precision. This system is particularly useful for manufacturing high-precision products such as stainless steel components. One-Key Release Fast ClampThis system allows quick and convenient attachment and removal of the upper punch, saving time and simplifying your workflow. Press Brake ToolingOur press brake tooling is crafted from 40CrMo material, hardened up to 52 HRC, ensuring extended die service life. Laser ProtectionThis safety feature is an excellent addition to any machine. It significantly reduces operational risks when employees work with the press brake. Hydraulic ValvesSafe, efficient, and built with premium quality. Schneider Electrical SystemOur press brakes utilize Schneider electrical components. These high-quality parts ensure stable machine performance even with fluctuating power supply, and replacement parts are readily available worldwide. CNC Back GaugeRI press brakes are equipped with a CNC back gauge featuring a solid structure to ensure optimal repeatability and high-precision axis positioning. Precision: Accurate, consistent positioning. Safety: Reduces workplace risks. Cost Savings: Cuts labor costs, boosts productivity. Flexibility: Integrates and adapts easily. 24/7 Operation: Uninterrupted performance. The Robot Industries RILOG1500165 ha​ndling robot is a state-of-the-art narrow aisle handling robot, ideal for a wide range of material handling processes. This mini laser navigation and handling AGV (Automated Guided Vehicle) is designed to operate efficiently in various environments, including those with narrow aisles.Key Features:360° Rotation Capability: The Robot Industries RILOG1500165 handling robot can rotate 360° in place, allowing for exceptional maneuverability in confined spaces.Narrow Aisle Operation: Capable of navigating aisles as narrow as 1.8 meters, making it a hot-selling product throughout the season.Safety Devices: The vehicle body is equipped with safety devices such as anti-collision edge strips to ensure safe operation. [ See details ] Tending Why RiA Ecosystem The challenge today: robotics is powerful but fragmented. Companies face steep learning curves, complex integrations, and high costs.Our answer: RiA Ecosystem brings everything together in one hub – connecting robotics across industries, simplifying adoption, and making advanced automation within reach for every company. How our ecosystem benefits RiA Ecosystem empowers multiple industries to work smarter: Robotic Welding – adaptive processes, faster setups, higher consistency. Palletizing & Intralogistics – flexible flows for modern supply chains. CNC Tending – reliable and autonomous machine operations. Industrial & Facility Cleaning – intelligent navigation and centralized scheduling. Inspection & Quality – AI-driven detection, monitoring, and traceability. Custom Cells – seamless integration for hybrid and unique processes How RiA Ecosystem works Connect robots, PLCs, and sensors seamlessly.Configure applications with guided templates.Program intuitively with low-code and AI support.Monitor performance through real-time dashboards.Manage & Scale across teams, sites, and fleets. The RiA promise RiA Ecosystem stands on five principles:Accessibility – robotics without barriers.Transparency – clear insights and real-time visibility.Scalability – from one robot to entire networks.Future-proofing – AI-driven, integration-ready.Confidence – built on secure, industry-grade standards. Call to vision RiA Ecosystem is more than a platform – it’s a movement towards smarter, connected, and accessible robotics. The future of automation is open to those who dare to take the first step. FAQ What is RiA Ecosystem? A unified hub designed to connect, program, monitor, and manage robotic solutions across industries. Which robots and PLCs are supported? Integration across multiple vendors via standard protocols and dedicated connectors. How can I engage today? By staying informed, connecting with us, and preparing your company for the next step in automation. Why RiA Ecosystem now? Because the future of robotics belongs to those who move first. RiA Ecosystem – the future of robotics begins with a single step. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: RIABOT_A2 Share : Description Specification Documents Description The Humanoid Robot forReal-World Work​ Explore solutions Get Quote Previous Next RiA X is a next-generation humanoid robotics platform engineered to operate safely and efficiently in real-world environments alongside human teams. Designed for adaptability, autonomy, and rapid system integration, RiA X enables advanced artificial intelligence to move beyond controlled laboratory settings and deliver measurable value in everyday industrial and operational workflows. One Platform. Endless Applications.RiA X is a modular humanoid platform capable of serving multiple industries and operational scenarios. Its flexible architecture allows fast configuration for diverse use cases without requiring changes to existing infrastructure.Typical application areas include: Manufacturing and assembly Logistics and material handling Maintenance and inspection Service tasks and repetitive or hazardous operations Hardware and software configurations can be adapted quickly, enabling organizations to scale deployment efficiently as operational needs evolve. TYPICAL APPLICATION AREAS INCLUDE: Manufacturing and assembly Logistics and material handling Maintenance and inspection Service tasks and repetitive operations Advanced Humanoid ArchitectureThe humanoid form of RiA X is not aesthetic — it is functional.Designed to work in environments built for humans, RiA X can: Operate in standard human workspaces Use conventional tools and equipment Manipulate objects with precise bimanual control Maintain balance, stability, and safety during motion Every element of the architecture is optimized for reliability and efficiency in continuous, real-world operation. Autonomous by DesignRiA X is autonomous by design, capable of independent operation or seamless collaboration with existing systems and robotic fleets.Key autonomous capabilities include: Advanced navigation and environmental perception Real-time decision-making Self-diagnostics and continuous optimization Individual operation or coordinated fleet deployment Autonomy is native to the platform — not an add-on. Built for Seamless IntegrationRiA X is engineered for fast deployment within existing workflows. Compatibility with standard industrial systems Flexible software integration Rapid implementation without major process redesign From the first hours of operation, RiA X becomes an active and productive component of your operational ecosystem. Built for Seamless IntegrationRiA X is engineered for fast deployment within existing workflows. Compatibility with standard industrial systems Flexible software integration Rapid implementation without major process redesign From the first hours of operation, RiA X becomes an active and productive component of your operational ecosystem. Designed in Europe. Built to Perform Globally.RiA X is the result of a mature European technology ecosystem, developed under some of the world’s highest standards for quality, safety, and regulatory compliance.This foundation delivers consistent performance, reliability, and trust across global deployments. The Future Works Alongside You RiA X is more than a robot. It is an intelligent extension of your workforce — designed to work alongside people, increase operational efficiency, and redefine what is possible in real-world automation. Designed for adaptability, autonomy, and rapid system integration, RiA X enables advanced artificial intelligence to move beyond controlled laboratory settings and deliver measurable value in everyday industrial and operational workflows. One Platform. Endless Applications.RiA X is a modular humanoid platform capable of serving multiple industries and operational scenarios. Its flexible architecture allows fast configuration for diverse use cases without requiring changes to existing infrastructure.Typical application areas include: Manufacturing and assembly Logistics and material handling Maintenance and inspection Service tasks and repetitive or hazardous operations Hardware and software configurations can be adapted quickly, enabling organizations to scale deployment efficiently as operational needs evolve. TYPICAL APPLICATION AREAS INCLUDE: Manufacturing and assembly Logistics and material handling Maintenance and inspection Service tasks and repetitive operations Advanced Humanoid ArchitectureThe humanoid form of RiA X is not aesthetic — it is functional.Designed to work in environments built for humans, RiA X can: Operate in standard human workspaces Use conventional tools and equipment Manipulate objects with precise bimanual control Maintain balance, stability, and safety during motion Every element of the architecture is optimized for reliability and efficiency in continuous, real-world operation. Autonomous by DesignRiA X is autonomous by design, capable of independent operation or seamless collaboration with existing systems and robotic fleets.Key autonomous capabilities include: Advanced navigation and environmental perception Real-time decision-making Self-diagnostics and continuous optimization Individual operation or coordinated fleet deployment Autonomy is native to the platform — not an add-on. Login or Register to view price ​Request price SKU: JAKA_VisEd_mini Share : Description Specification Description The JAKA Robotics Vision Package is a versatile and easy-to-use development tool designed for seamless integration into educational and industrial applications. It combines advanced features like visual character recognition, color analysis, distance measurement, and QR code scanning. These capabilities enable simulation of real-world industrial tasks such as handling, grasping, detection, and recognition.Additionally, the package includes interactive features, like playing Tic-Tac-Toe, to blend foundational robotics concepts with hands-on practice, making learning engaging and practical. Ideal for schools, corporate training programs, and industry demonstrations, this all-in-one solution empowers robotics educators and learners with practical tools and real-world applications. Portable and easy-to-use Package Integrated portable case, quick installation, easy to move, making it an ideal choice for vocational training in schools and training engineers in enterprises.Desktop six-axis CobotElectric vacuum gripper2D vision cameraModule boxTic-tac-toe module Comprehensive course A wide range of resources on robotics theory and practical applications designed for teaching and demonstration. Ensure learning safety Equipped with safety functions such as emergency stop buttons, it ensures the safety of students when operating the robot, providing a safe learning environment for teachers and students. You are successfully register your account Sign up - or - Log in With : Products RiA ecosystem Company About RI Succes Stories Franchise Video Gallery News Jobs Blog Contact Us Shop RI Catalog Ai Agents RI Cleaning RI Welding RI collaborative welding RI Industrial welding RI CNC tending RI palletizing RI Logistics RI CNC machines RI cobots RI industrial robots RI Vision RI Humanoid CONTACT US → English (UK) EN 简体中文 English (UK) Français Deutsch Italiano Română русский язык Español 0 Sign in Products RiA ecosystem Company About RI Succes Stories Franchise Video Gallery News Jobs Blog Contact Us Shop RI Catalog Ai Agents RI Cleaning RI Welding RI collaborative welding RI Industrial welding RI CNC tending RI palletizing RI Logistics RI CNC machines RI cobots RI industrial robots RI Vision RI Humanoid CONTACT US → My Cart 0 Sign in RI INDUSTRIAL CLEANING ROBOTS.Smart, Modular & Plug-and-Play SolutionsExplore solutions Previous Next Industrial cleaning remains one of the most time-consuming, costly, and inconsistent maintenance tasks in manufacturing, logistics, and warehousing. Traditional manual cleaning methods struggle to keep up with the scale, safety regulations, and hygiene expectations of modern facilities.The result?Wasted labor hours. Unplanned downtime. Hidden safety risks. And rising costs tied to inefficiency and staff shortages, a constant challenge for facility managers trying to maintain spotless, compliant environments.Enter Robot Industries’ Autonomous Industrial Cleaning Robots a new generation of intelligent, self-navigating robotic floor scrubbers built to transform industrial cleaning. These robots deliver consistent, high-precision cleaning 24/7, cutting costs, improving safety, and ensuring compliance with the most demanding hygiene standards.Whether it’s a 2,000 m² warehouse or a 50,000 m² logistics hub, RI robots adapt, learn, and perform, so your floors stay clean while your team focuses on what truly matters: production. Indoor all in one Cleaning RobotFor shopping centers, offices, hotels, and retail chains, the CleanX robotic cleaner ensures spotless results with high autonomy and consistency.Key Advantages: Autonomous navigation and obstacle detection Multifunctional operation – vacuuming, scrubbing, mopping, drying Low-noise and energy-efficient design Remote monitoring and performance trackingReduced maintenance and operating costsView CleanX Cleaning Robots Indoor Sweeper RobotIn production areas, warehouses, and logistics centers, robotic cleaning systems maintain safety and efficiency standards effortlessly.Key Advantages:Continuous operation in harsh environmentsIntegration with production or logistics systemsEfficient cleaning of dust, oil, and debrisEnhances safety by minimizing manual tasksScalable for large industrial areasExplore Indoor Sweeper Robot Outdoor Cleaning RobotsPerfect for parking areas, parks, campuses, and streets, outdoor cleaning robots bring autonomy to large-scale maintenance operations.Key Advantages:Operates safely in outdoor conditionsLiDAR and camera-based navigationSweeping, vacuuming, and washing capabilitiesRemote scheduling and operationSustainable water and energy consumptionDiscover Outdoor Cleaning Robots Disinfection Robots Autonomous Disinfection for Healthcare and Sensitive EnvironmentsFor hospitals, clinics, and laboratories, robotic disinfection provides precision and safety with zero human exposure.Key Advantages:UV-C light or dry mist disinfectionAutomated programmable routesReal-time sterilization reportsConsistent hygiene and complianceCompact design for easy mobilityLearn About Disinfection Robots Did you know…Facilities that use autonomous cleaning robots save an average of 2.5 labor hours per 1,000 m² cleaned? (Source: ISSA Research, 2023).Autonomous robotic floor scrubbers can clean up to 35,000 sq. ft per hour with 99% path efficiency and obstacle avoidance accuracy? Industrial Cleaning Robots That Work Smarter. Built for Impact and Efficiency Code free programmingOur robots use intuitive, no-code interfaces that allow operators to deploy, schedule, and monitor cleaning tasks without technical expertise. With adaptive AI learning, routes optimize automatically for maximum coverage and minimal overlap, no programming required. Plug & Play IntegrationSet up in under an hour. Connect, calibrate, and clean; it’s that simple. The plug & play design allows quick deployment across multiple sites and easy integration with facility management systems (FMS) and IoT dashboards for real-time data and control. Modular System ArchitectureFrom robotic floor scrubbers and vacuum units to UVC disinfection modules, each robot is built with modular hardware, enabling tailored configurations for every environment, from food production lines to pharmaceutical cleanrooms. Scalable, Future-Ready DesignWhether you operate one facility or a global network, RI’s scalable architecture grows with your needs. Our RiA digital ecosystem connects multiple robots across sites, offering centralized control, performance analytics, and predictive maintenance alerts. Why Choose Robotic Cleaning Solutions✔ Lower operating costs and higher consistency ✔ Full automation and traceable results ✔ Simple to deploy and manage ✔ Sustainable and safe cleaning performance ✔ Scalable for any facility size ✔ Smart Cleaning. Simplified. Applications of Autonomous Industrial Cleaning Robots Manufacturing Plants & WarehousesKeep production floors dust-free and safe. Robots automatically clean between shifts, minimizing downtime and preventing slip hazards from spills or debris.Airports, Stations & Transportation HubsAutonomous cleaning robots operate during off-hours or in high-traffic areas, ensuring spotless terminals and concourses while optimizing battery usage and routes.Food & Beverage Production FacilitiesMeet strict hygiene and HACCP standards with chemical-free cleaning and UVC disinfection options that target bacterial hotspots and eliminate contamination risks.Retail, Malls & SupermarketsRobotic floor scrubbers maintain a polished, consistent appearance without obstructing shoppers, improving brand perception and operational efficiency.Logistics Centers & Industrial ComplexesIdeal for large-scale warehouses, robots can coordinate through the RiA ecosystem for scheduled, autonomous cleaning that integrates with warehouse management systems (WMS).Hospitals, Laboratories & Pharmaceutical SitesDeploy UVC-equipped autonomous cleaning robots to disinfect sensitive zones such as operating rooms, laboratories, or pharmaceutical manufacturing areas, ensuring a sterile and compliant environment. Real-World Case Study, Manufacturing Facility Automation A major automotive components manufacturer in Central Europe faced challenges maintaining cleanliness across its 15,000 m² production floor, leading to micro-dust contamination and downtime for manual cleaning.After integrating two RI autonomous industrial cleaning robots, the company achieved:68% reduction in cleaning labor costs43% increase in uptime through automated off-shift cleaning cycles100% compliance with ISO 14644-1 cleanliness standardsROI achieved in under 9 monthsToday, the robots operate autonomously during night shifts, reporting performance metrics directly to the facility’s cloud dashboard, a seamless, self-managing cleaning process. FAQ about Industrial & Autonomous Cleaning Robots How do cleaning robots work?Autonomous industrial cleaning robots use a combination of AI, LiDAR mapping, ultrasonic sensors, and computer vision to navigate facilities safely and efficiently. They scrub, vacuum, or disinfect surfaces while automatically avoiding obstacles and optimizing cleaning paths for maximum coverage.What are three facts about industrial cleaning robots?1. Modern robotic floor scrubbers can clean over 30,000 sq. ft per hour with minimal human supervision.2. They reduce cleaning-related labor costs by up to 70% while maintaining consistent quality.3. Many models support IoT connectivity and real-time performance monitoring through cloud dashboards.How much does an industrial cleaning robot cost?The industrial cleaning robot price typically ranges between $15,000 and $75,000 USD, depending on size, autonomy level, battery capacity, and whether it’s a robotic floor scrubber, vacuum robot, or UVC disinfection model.What is an autonomous industrial cleaning robot?It’s a self-driving cleaning system that performs floor scrubbing, sweeping, or disinfection without manual control. Using AI navigation and machine learning, it adapts to new layouts and schedules cleaning based on occupancy data.What is a robotic floor scrubber?A robotic floor scrubber automates floor cleaning using rotating brushes, suction systems, and onboard water tanks. It’s ideal for factories, warehouses, airports, and retail spaces where large areas need regular, deep cleaning.Are autonomous cleaning robots safe to use around people?Yes. They feature collision avoidance, proximity sensors, and automatic shutdown when detecting human presence, ensuring safe operation in shared workspaces.Do industrial robot scrubbers require maintenance?Minimal maintenance is needed, mainly brush replacement, water tank cleaning, and sensor calibration. Ri Cleaning Robots are designed for easy service access and remote diagnostics.Can autonomous cleaning robots replace human janitors?They assist. Robots handle repetitive floor cleaning while staff focus on inspection, detailing, or sanitation tasks that need human precision.
